text: geuleona saaghan bangbeob-eulo eod neunjaneun geuwa gat-eun saaghan bosang-eul bad-eul geos-imyeo chiyog-i geudeul-ui eolgul ol deopdoda geudeul-eun hananim-ui bunnolobuteo bohohae jul jaga eobs-euni machi geudeul-ui eolgul-i bam-ui amhog-eulo ssayeojin geos gatdeola geudeul-eun buljiog-ui ju in-euloseo geugos-eseo yeongsaenghanila
